data.name: AnalyzerPrefix
data.value: BC

data.name: Rule0001VariableNameShouldNotContainWhiteSpaceDescription
data.value: Variable name should not contain whitespace

data.name: Rule0001VariableNameShouldNotContainWhiteSpaceFormat
data.value: '{0}' cannot be used as a variable name. Names may not contain whitespace.

data.name: Rule0001VariableNameShouldNotContainWhiteSpaceTitle
data.value: Variable name should not contain whitespace

data.name: Rule0002VariableShouldNotContainWildcardSymbolsDescription
data.value: Variable name should not contain wildcard symbols such as % or &

data.name: Rule0002VariableShouldNotContainWildcardSymbolsFormat
data.value: '{0}' cannot be used as a variable name. Names should not contain wildcard symbols such as % or &.

data.name: Rule0002VariableShouldNotContainWildcardSymbolsTitle
data.value: Variable name should not contain wildcard symbols such as % or &

data.name: Rule0003MethodsNameShouldNotContainWhiteSpaceDescription
data.value: Procedure name should not contain whitespace

data.name: Rule0003MethodsNameShouldNotContainWhiteSpaceFormat
data.value: '{0}' cannot be used as a procedure name. Procedure name should not contain whitespace.

data.name: Rule0003MethodsNameShouldNotContainWhiteSpaceTitle
data.value: Procedure name should not contain whitespace

data.name: Rule0004GlobalVariablesMayBeAboveTriggersProceduresDescription
data.value: Global variables section should be above triggers and procedures

data.name: Rule0004GlobalVariablesMayBeAboveTriggersProceduresFormat
data.value: Move global variables section, it may be above triggers and procedures.

data.name: Rule0004GlobalVariablesMayBeAboveTriggersProceduresTitle
data.value: Global variables section should be above triggers and procedures

data.name: Rule0009First19TableFieldsIDReservedToPrimaryKeyDescription
data.value: First 19 Field IDs are reserved to primary key fields

data.name: Rule0009First19TableFieldsIDReservedToPrimaryKeyFormat
data.value: Renumber '{0}' field. First 19 Field IDs are reserved to primary key fields.

data.name: Rule0009First19TableFieldsIDReservedToPrimaryKeyTitle
data.value: First 19 Field IDs are reserved to primary key fields

data.name: Rule0011EnumExtensionsValuesNumberedInDedicatedRangeDescription
data.value: All values in enum extensions should be numbered in the dedicated extension or PTE range

data.name: Rule0011EnumExtensionsValuesNumberedInDedicatedRangeFormat
data.value: Renumber '{0}' value. All values in enum extensions should be numbered in the dedicated extension or PTE range.

data.name: Rule0011EnumExtensionsValuesNumberedInDedicatedRangeTitle
data.value: All values in enum extensions should be numbered in the dedicated extension or PTE range

data.name: Rule0012EmptyActionsSectionDescription
data.value: Empty Actions sections should be removed

data.name: Rule0012EmptyActionsSectionFormat
data.value: Remove empty Actions section.

data.name: Rule0012EmptyActionsSectionTitle
data.value: Empty Actions sections should be removed

data.name: Rule0013EmptyOnRunTriggerDescription
data.value: Empty OnRun triggers should be removed

data.name: Rule0013EmptyOnRunTriggerFormat
data.value: Remove empty OnRun trigger.

data.name: Rule0013EmptyOnRunTriggerTitle
data.value: Empty OnRun triggers should be removed

data.name: Rule0014HardcodedIpAddressDescription
data.value: Hardcoding IP addresses is security-sensitive

data.name: Rule0014HardcodedIpAddressFormat
data.value: Make sure using hardcoded IP address '{0}' is safe.

data.name: Rule0014HardcodedIpAddressTitle
data.value: Hardcoding IP addresses is security-sensitive

data.name: Rule0015FlowFieldsShouldNotBeEditableDescription
data.value: FlowFields should not be editable.

data.name: Rule0015FlowFieldsShouldNotBeEditableFormat
data.value: Field with name '{0}' must have the Editable property equals false.

data.name: Rule0015FlowFieldsShouldNotBeEditableTitle
data.value: FlowFields should not be editable.

data.name: Rule0016CommitMustBeExplainedByCommentDescription
data.value: Commit() must have a comment to justify its existance. Either a leading or a trailing comment.

data.name: Rule0016CommitMustBeExplainedByCommentFormat
data.value: Commit() must have a comment to justify its existance. Either a leading or a trailing comment.

data.name: Rule0016CommitMustBeExplainedByCommentTitle
data.value: Commit() must have a comment to justify its existance. Either a leading or a trailing comment.

data.name: Rule0017DoNotUseObjectIdInSystemFunctionsDescription
data.value: Using hardcoded IDs in functions is not allowed.

data.name: Rule0017DoNotUseObjectIdInSystemFunctionsFormat
data.value: Using hardcoded IDs in functions is not allowed.

data.name: Rule0017DoNotUseObjectIdInSystemFunctionsTitle
data.value: Using hardcoded IDs in functions is not allowed.

data.name: Rule0018CheckForMissingCaptionsDescription
data.value: Caption is missing

data.name: Rule0018CheckForMissingCaptionsFormat
data.value: '{0}' must have caption property.

data.name: Rule0018CheckForMissingCaptionsTitle
